titleNullable: Electricity & Gas Consumption and Tariff Data
descriptionNullable:
**If you find this useful, remind me to update this monthly.**

This dataset provides detailed half-hourly records of electricity and gas consumption and corresponding pricing data from September 2023. It is designed for energy consumption analysis, cost estimation, and time series forecasting.

  
Potential Uses:
- Analyzing daily and seasonal patterns of electricity usage.
- Calculating the cost of electricity consumption with and without tax implications.
- Building predictive models for future consumption and cost based on historical data.
- Assessing the impact of time-based pricing on electricity usage behaviours.

This data can also serve as a foundation for cost-saving strategies and sustainability efforts within energy management practices.
